extendedInfo.description: The No.1 feature rich Weight & Body tracking app on Android today.Highest rated Health & Fitness App on Google Play in BDM's Android App Review Magazine Vol. 6.This app allows you to track & monitor your weight, height, body measurements, BMI , body fat and add daily notes - not just for you , but your whole family & friends as it is multi user enabled for no extra cost.This app not only helps track your progress to the weight and body shape you are after but monitor yourself once you achieve it.It is the perfect app for tracking progress if you are on a diet,working out, measuring your baby bump or monitoring your children's growth as they get older.Built on top of this data you are tracking is a full advanced graphing facilities that lets you compare and overlay your different statistics to see how you are doing.FEATURESâ Tracking, Monitoring AND Goal setting for :  â Weight in Stones, Lbs or Kgs  â Height in Feet & Inches or CMS  â Bodyfat Percentage - Calculated from entered details or Manually Entered  â Track your Waist, Hips, Chest, Calves, Thigh, Neck, Forearms, Upperarms, Wrist & Babybump measurements in Cm's or Inchesâ Multi-user support with full password protectionâ Built-in BMI Calculatorâ Built-in Bodyfat Calculatorâ Navigation via illustrated calendar viewâ Advanced Graphing showing progress over time with goalsâ Ability to record notes on each dayâ Weight loss widget showing total lost, last amount lost and distance from goal.â Export all data to spreadsheetâ Save pictures of your graphs to your SDCard, then share via Android's Gallery like any other picture.

reviews.title: Great app, please keep updated!!
reviews.comment: I love the app, been using it for a while now. Please add \"Bone mass\" and update the graphics! It would be great also to add \"Daily Water Intake\", it\'s very helpful seeing how water intake affects your weight in graphical chart!
reviews.author: Ayman AlAnsari

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Very helpful. Good way of encouraging weightloss! Works fine on desire hd
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: So easy to use and no crashes! I love th summery the most.
reviews.author: nicole beam

reviews.title: Fab but . . .
reviews.comment: This is a great bit of kit but I would give it 5 stars if u could add yr own catagories to the main list. I\'m tracking lots of parameters bp, pulse, exercise type, time I took the readings, muscle mass, water content etc etc and it would be fabulous if you could input these to the main program itself rather than having to record all these values as a long list of notes.  It\'s still a very useful bit of kit though so well done guys :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So far looks good!
reviews.comment: Looks like just the application I need for tracking more than scale weight.  The measurements section is the key for me as I build some muscle and loose fat. Thank you so very much for this application - female,30s with plan to drop 50+lbs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great application love it!
reviews.comment: Great we application I\'m working as a personal trainer its great savings weights and girth mesurments. Simple to use.
reviews.author: chris gallagher

reviews.title: Tracks All I Need, Very Flexible
reviews.comment: I just got this app & it seems to have all I need.  It allows tracking in different units, lots of measurements & BMI.  Plus it lets you export data into Excel (although I haven\'t tried it yet).
reviews.author: Jen Kunkel

reviews.title: Looks good
reviews.comment: Looks like a good app to keep track of all your stats. I just entered a whole load of weight data from a previous iPhone app, only to find the graph can only show 1 year. I would like to be able to graph my entire history.
reviews.author: Andrew Rubotham

reviews.title: So much help!
reviews.comment: I found this app to be a lot of fun to keep updated. It allows for you to be excited to monitor yourself and thus motivates you to stay on your plan.  I only wish you could choose to measure both arms/legs...what woman is ever symmetrical? Also, it would be kool if you could add additional body areas to be able to monitor.Otherwise, great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Tool
reviews.comment: This is an excellent overall tool to monitor body progress! I have had it installed for a while now and am impressed with the improvements that have been made over time. I would love to see a feature added where you can track caliper readings for measuring body fat.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really good, but...
reviews.comment: It would be nice to see a chart of overall cm/inches lost or gained.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just what I needed
reviews.comment: This app has just what I wanted.  Set a weight goal and track it, graph your progress and makes notes daily, or as often as you like.  Improvements?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple to use, but with great features. I can see my progress every time I weigh in.\tI especially like the body measurement details, which is why I got this app instead of another.
reviews.author: Schley Carr

reviews.title: JUST THE RIGHT APP!
reviews.comment: Overall this app provides everything I was looking for in one to assist in tracking my body transformation progress!!
reviews.author: Regina Williams

reviews.title: EXCELLENT APP.
reviews.comment: JUST WHAT YOU NEED TO RECORD YOU WEIGHT ETC.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: Well worth the money! Lets bTrack not only my weight and bmi but also every measurement for full body tracking. LOVE IT!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Body & weight monitor
reviews.comment: Is one of the best apps I\'ve purchased
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple & effective
reviews.comment: Easy to use. No crashes so far (used for 3 weeks). Just what I needed for tracking my weight.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great motivation to see my progress so clearly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good solid app
reviews.comment: This could do with the style updating to reflect recommended Android ICS design guidelines, but is functional, reliable and simple. A bit convoluted when entering data, but does the job fairly well. Recommended :)
reviews.author: A Google User
